data.comment: The match has started at Estadio Azteca.
Throw-in Santos Laguna.
In the minute 2, Ball safe as Santos Laguna is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Can America get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Santos Laguna's half?
Santos Laguna awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 6, Betsiel Hernandez is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
America needs to be cautious. Santos Laguna have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in for America in their own half.
In the minute 7, Santos Laguna to take a throw-in in America territory.
In Mexico City a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Betsiel Hernandez is back on his feet again.
In the minute 8, Santos Laguna are coming forward and Ulises Rivas gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for America at Estadio Azteca.
Santos Laguna awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 10, Fernando Hernandez Gomez awards the away team a throw-in.
Free kick America.
Sebastian Cordova (America) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 11, America have been awarded a corner by Fernando Hernandez Gomez.
Throw-in for Santos Laguna at Estadio Azteca.
Throw-in for America in the half of Santos Laguna.
In the minute 13, Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a America throw-in in Santos Laguna's half.
Throw-in for Santos Laguna at Estadio Azteca.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 15, America have a goal kick.
America are pushing forward but Roger Martinez's finish is wide of the goal.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez awards Santos Laguna a goal kick.
In the minute 17, Goal! America have got their heads in front thanks to a Roger Martinez strike.
Sebastian Cordova instrumental with a fine assist.
Free kick for Santos Laguna in their own half.
In the minute 20, Santos Laguna's Diego Valdes misses with an attempt on goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Mexico City.
Throw-in for America close to the penalty box.
In the minute 22, America drives forward and Leonardo Suarez gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Can America capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Santos Laguna's half?
Free kick in a good position for America!
In the minute 23, Ball goes out of play for a Santos Laguna goal kick.
Free kick for Santos Laguna in the half of America.
Throw-in for Santos Laguna in the half of America.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a free kick to America in their own half.
Ball safe as Santos Laguna is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 26, At Estadio Azteca, Julio Furch has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In the minute 29, Goal! America increase their lead to 2-0 through a well-placed header from Leonardo Suarez.
Great play from Roger Martinez to set up the goal.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a free kick to Santos Laguna in their own half.
In the minute 31, Goal! America extend their lead to 3-0 thanks to a Federico Vinas header.
That's a fine assist from Leonardo Suarez.
Free kick for America in their own half.
In the minute 35, Corner awarded to America.
Corner awarded to America.
Can America get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Santos Laguna's half?
In the minute 36, Fernando Hernandez Gomez awards the home team a throw-in.
America to take a throw-in in Santos Laguna territory.
America have been awarded a corner by Fernando Hernandez Gomez.
In the minute 38, Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a free kick to Santos Laguna.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a free kick to Santos Laguna.
America's Luis Reyes has been booked in Mexico City.
In the minute 40, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In Mexico City a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Free kick America.
In the minute 42, Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a America throw-in in Santos Laguna's half.
America's Paul Aguilar breaks free at Estadio Azteca. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez awards Santos Laguna a goal kick.
In the minute 43, Free kick for Santos Laguna in the half of America.
Throw-in for Santos Laguna in the half of America.
America awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over at Estadio Azteca.
The second half has started at Estadio Azteca.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a Santos Laguna throw-in in America's half.
In the minute 46, Throw-in high up the field for Santos Laguna in Mexico City.
In Mexico City Santos Laguna attack through Diego Valdes. The finish is off target, however.
America have a goal kick.
In the minute 47, In Mexico City a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Jose van Rankin is replacing Betsiel Hernandez for the away team.
In the minute 48, America to take a throw-in in Santos Laguna territory.
Jonathan Diaz is on a sub for Edgar Games for Santos Laguna.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick America.
In the minute 50, Sebastian Cordova for America gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Santos Laguna goal kick.
Diego Valdes of Santos Laguna gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 50, Goal kick for America at Estadio Azteca.
Throw-in for America in their own half.
Can America get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Santos Laguna's half?
In the minute 51, Santos Laguna awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Santos Laguna to take a throw-in in America territory.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Mexico City.
In the minute 52, Throw-in America.
Throw-in for America in the half of Santos Laguna.
Diego Valdes of Santos Laguna gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 54, America have a goal kick.
America awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Santos Laguna's Ulises Rivas gets in a shot on goal at Estadio Azteca. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 57, Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a America throw-in in Santos Laguna's half.
America pushes forward through Leonardo Suarez, whose finish on goal is saved.
Ball goes out of play for a Santos Laguna goal kick.
In the minute 58, Free kick for America in their own half.
Throw-in for America at Estadio Azteca.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a free kick to America.
In the minute 60, Fernando Hernandez Gomez awards America a goal kick.
The home team replace Leonardo Suarez with Henry Martin.
In the minute 61, Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a free kick to Santos Laguna in their own half.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a throw-in for Santos Laguna, close to America's area.
Santos Laguna make their third substitution with Jordan Carrillo replacing Eduardo Aguirre.
Free kick for Santos Laguna in the half of America.
In the minute 63, Attention is being given to Santos Lagunaâ€™s Julio Furch and play has been suspended briefly.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Mexico City to check on Sebastian Caceres, who is grimacing with pain.
Santos Laguna have been given a penalty at Estadio Azteca...
In the minute 66, Julio Furch for Santos Laguna is back on the field again.
Fernando Gorriaran's spot-kick reduces the deficit 3-1.
America's Sebastian Caceres is back in action after a slight knock.
In the minute 68, Bruno Valdez (America) has received a first yellow card.
Alonso Escoboza is on a sub for Luis Reyes for America.
Emilio Sanchez is replacing Richard Sanchez for the home team.
In the minute 70, Can America get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Santos Laguna's half?
Santos Laguna awarded a free kick in their own half.
Goal kick for America at Estadio Azteca.
In the minute 73, Sebastian Caceres is booked for the home team.
Diego Valdes gets his shot on target but fails to score for Santos Laguna.
The match at Estadio Azteca has been interrupted briefly for a check on Guillermo Ochoa, who is down injured.
In the minute 76, Corner awarded to Santos Laguna.
Guillermo Ochoa is back on the pitch.
Santos Laguna have been awarded a corner by Fernando Hernandez Gomez.
In the minute 76, Ball safe as Santos Laguna is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in Santos Laguna.
Free kick America.
In the minute 78, Free kick for Santos Laguna in their own half.
America awarded a free kick in their own half.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 80, Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Roger Martinez for America who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Roger Martinez returns to the field for America after picking up a slight injury.
Free kick for Santos Laguna in the half of America.
In the minute 83, It's a goal kick for the home team in Mexico City.
Santos Laguna have a dangerous throw-in.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a free kick to Santos Laguna in their own half.
In the minute 85, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
America awarded a free kick in their own half.
Santos Laguna's Julio Furch gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 86, Ball goes out of play for a America goal kick.
Free kick for Santos Laguna in their own half.
Throw-in for Santos Laguna in their own half.
In the minute 87, In Mexico City Santos Laguna drive forward through Jordan Carrillo. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Throw-in for America close to the penalty box.
Throw-in for Santos Laguna in their own half.
In the minute 88, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In Mexico City America attack through Henry Martin. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Mexico City.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a free kick to Santos Laguna in their own half.
Santos Laguna have been awarded a corner by Fernando Hernandez Gomez.
Can Santos Laguna capitalize from this throw-in deep inside America's half?
Fernando Hernandez Gomez awards America a goal kick.
7 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a America throw-in in Santos Laguna's half.
Ruben Gonzalez for America drives towards goal at Estadio Azteca. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Throw-in for Santos Laguna in the half of America.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for America close to the penalty box.
Henry Martin of America smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In Mexico City a free kick has been awarded the home team.
America to take a throw-in in Santos Laguna territory.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a throw-in for America, close to Santos Laguna's area.
Can America get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Santos Laguna's half?
Fernando Hernandez Gomez blows to end the match. The final score is 3-1.
America make their fourth substitution with Antonio Lopez Amenabar replacing Sebastian Cordova.
Miguel Herrera (America) has taken off Roger Martinez who seemed to be grimacing with pain earlier. A possible injury. Ruben Gonzalez is the replacement.
